summary.span: 代表具有兩個單精確度浮點值的向量。

span.span: Represents a vector with two single-precision floating-point values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 結構提供硬體加速的支援。The structure provides support for hardware acceleration. [!INCLUDE[vectors-are-rows-paragraph](~/includes/system-numerics-vectors-are-rows.md)]

summary.span: 將向量的元素複製到指定的陣列。

span.span: Copies the elements of the vector to a specified array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `array` 必須有至少兩個項目。`array` must have at least two elements. 方法會複製為向量的元素索引 0 開始。The method copies the vector's elements starting at index 0.

exception.span: 目前執行個體中的項目數大於陣列中的項目數。

span.span: The number of elements in the current instance is greater than in the array.

summary.span: 從指定的索引位置開始，將向量的元素複製到指定的陣列。

span.span: Copies the elements of the vector to a specified array starting at a specified index position.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `array` 必須有足夠數目的項目，以容納兩個向量的項目。`array` must have a sufficient number of elements to accommodate the two vector elements. 換句話說，項目`index`並`index`+ 1 必須已存在於`array`。In other words, elements `index` and `index` + 1 must already exist in `array`.

exception.span: 目前執行個體中的項目數大於陣列中的項目數。

span.span: The number of elements in the current instance is greater than in the array.
is greater than or equal to the array length.

override this.ToString : unit -> string

summary.span: 使用預設格式傳回目前執行個體的字串表示。

span.span: Returns the string representation of the current instance using default formatting.

returns.span: 目前執行個體的字串表示。

span.span: The string representation of the current instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會傳回在其中向量的每個項目會格式化使用的"G"（一般） 的格式字串和目前執行緒文化特性的格式化慣例的字串。This method returns a string in which each element of the vector is formatted using the "G" (general) format string and the formatting conventions of the current thread culture. 「\<"和">"字元用來開始和結束的字串中和目前的文化特性後接空格的屬性用來分隔每個項目。The "\<" and ">" characters are used to begin and end the string, and the current culture's property followed by a space is used to separate each element.
